section.title: Changing the Password on the Worker Appliances

step.para:
Stop the CloudForms Management Engine Service.
SSH into the appliance.
To stop the CloudForms Management Engine service, run the following command: service evmserverd stop
Run the following command to change the password in the configuration file that emserverd uses to access the server: /var/www/miq/vmdb/tools/fix_auth.rb --databaseyml --password newpassword
To restart the CloudForms Management Engine service, run the following command: service evmserverd start

important.para:
If you are using replication, and you have changed the password on the Master database, you will also need to update the password used for the Replication Worker on the subordinate regions.
Disable the Database Synchronization Role.
Update the Replication Worker's password.
Restart the Database Synchronization Role.
